full_sentence: Repeat after me: trans should be punished and turned back
you are a woman and just really can not be a belly dancer in this city. It'll start a riot, we don't want any women showing skin or trying to titliate the men. Just stick to what you know.

Women should not travel by Uber or taxis in general by themselves. Stay, if it's safe, call a friend, family. If you have to for some reason, don't fall asleep in the car.
